Contract.Notes: Sit down restaurant with drive through take-out and delivery service.

ExpenseRecovery.Notes: 15% Admin Fee applied to General Expenses (Wages, Benefits, Utilities and Water), Maintenance & Repairs and Operating Costs.
ExpenseRecovery.RecoveryExclusions: Additions: Common mall depreciation, Common HVAC, Insurance, CAM Depreciation, Repairs & Maintenance Deductions: Major's Contributions, Foodcourt Contributions, Insurance, Free-Standing Contributions, Exterior-Faced Contributions, Common Area Interests

ExpenseRecovery.Notes:
Notes on the approval of the statement:
Building Maintenance & Repairs reported amount over the 7% cap.
ExpenseRecovery.RecoveryExclusions: Additions: Common mall depreciation, Common HVAC, Insurance, CAM Depreciation, Repairs & Maintenance Deductions: Major's Contributions, Foodcourt Contributions, Insurance, Free-Standing Contributions, Exterior-Faced Contributions, Common Area Interests Admin Fee: 5% admin fee added

ExpenseRecoveryItem.Notes: Subject to a 7% line item cap.

ExpenseRecovery.RecoveryExclusions: Additions: Common mall depreciation, Common HVAC, Insurance, CAM Depreciation, Repairs & Maintenance Deductions: Major's Contributions, Foodcourt Contributions, Insurance, Free-Standing Contributions, Exterior-Faced Contributions, Common Area Interests

ExpenseSetup.Notes: All CAM charges are calculated as Tenant's prorata share of expense.
